title: “Day in the life” content is collapsing into speed
signal: Creators are compressing the format into rapid, hyper-edited clips across small accounts.
whyItMatters: Long-form authenticity is losing status. Efficiency and pace are becoming the flex.

title: Comment screenshots are becoming primary content again
signal: Comment threads are being reposted as standalone posts instead of replies.
whyItMatters: When formats saturate, attention shifts to reaction and social proof. Comments become the content.
